data.pageDescription: Michel Murabito talk's: Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
data.children: We will explore how Buildpacks.io can transform the way developers build, deploy, and manage applications in a cloud-native environment. We'll discuss the core concepts of buildpacks, their role in simplifying the build process, and how they enhance developer productivity by automating the creation of production-ready container images. Attendees will gain insights into best practices for integrating Buildpacks.io into their development workflows and see real-world examples of its impact on accelerating application delivery. Join us to discover how Buildpacks.io can empower your cloud-native development journey.

schema.name: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Europe 2024
schema.description: At KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Europe 2024, Michel Murabito delivered an insightful talk on Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
